solution_line_template: When Jayson is {jayson_age_at_time_1} his dad is {jayson_age_at_time_1} x {dad_age_multiplier} = <<{jayson_age_at_time_1}*{dad_age_multiplier}={dad_age_at_time_1}>>{dad_age_at_time_1} years old.
